snippet: The Chinese authorities said they had detained 23 suspects in Shanghai and seized more than 100 guns and gun parts.
abstract: Chinese authorities say they have detained 23 suspects in Shanghai and broken up an international gun trafficking ring that conspired with a United States soldier to smuggle firearms into China.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese authorities said they had detained 23 suspects in Shanghai and seized more than 100 guns and gun parts.

headline.seo: Gun Ring Involving U.S. Soldier Is Broken Up, Chinese Officials Say
headline.main: Gun Ring Involving U.S. Soldier Is Broken Up, Chinese Officials Say
headline.print_headline: China: 23 Detained in U.S.-China Gun Trafficking Ring

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
